roleset.name: strike
roleset.note: CUDGEL-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd.Member of VNcls spank-18.3. (from cudgel.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: Mercedes-Benz and Cerberus have cudgeled a once-proud automotive company into coma.

example.name: cudgel, not cuddle
example.text: In Scott 's The Bride of Lammermoor -LRB- Chapter VII -RRB- , one reads about a boy ? cudgelling an ass , ? and one goes back over the passage to reassure himself that it does not contain a typographical error for ? cuddling . ?
